title: Doncaster Rovers manager Darren Ferguson charged by FA
description: Doncaster Rovers manager Darren Ferguson has been charged by the FA for comments made to the media following the game against Plymouth Argyle on Saturday.
content: In an interview after the match, Ferguson labelled the standard of refereeing as "appalling" and claimed the officials should be "shot" after his side were not awarded a penalty.Ferguson later apologised for his remarks and insisted they were "tongue-in-cheek" and said he does not advocate violence against officials.The FA have alleged his comments were improper and/or brought the game into disreputeFerguson has until Monday January 22 to respond.
